title: Client crashing when i open store or hextech craft?
body:
hey riot or whoever this may concern lol
ive been getting alot of client crashing and i ve asked other people in game and they said it is also crashing for them?
what can i do to fix this?
ive been crashing out of no where lol and i haven't been able to use hex tech crafting ever since spot light for kled came out

replies.body:
We're aware of some issues around crashing when interacting with Hextech Crafting and the store and are looking into a fix. In the meantime, some players were able to resolve this by running windows updates, but this may cause FPS/Stability problems if you don't [disable the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) or Xbox Game DVR.

Let me know if you have any questions.
so no riot players or anyone gonna help me soollve this or anyone?
